name: Pantheon Slam Jam
description:
Pantheon Slam Jam is a 1-4 person couch co-op side scrolling beat 'em up. 

Story Synopsis: Assemble a team of supernatual creatures to take down iconic beasts, travelling to various regions from around the world. Once defeated, use those beasts to continue your journey to conquer them all. 

Controls: Can be played with Mouse + Keyboard and/or Gamepad(Xbox) 

  • Start/Select: Enter|Start 
  • Select Character: Left/Right Arrow|Left/Right D-Pad 
  • Movement: WASD|Left Stick 
  • Light Attack: Mouse 1|X 
  • Heavy Attack: Mouse 2|B 
  • Ultimate Attack: E|Left + Right Bumpers 
  • Block: Shift|Right Trigger 
  • Interact: F|Y 
  • Teleport to Others: Spacebar|A 
  • Drop out: Tab| Left Special Button

NOTE: Player 1 is always mouse and keyboard. Players 2-4 are controllers, but you can play with any. Main Menu is player 1.

Credits 

Southpaw Game Studios' debut GameJam and game. Please enjoy.

Music: https://soundcloud.com/joseslaughter
